title: 🎄 Christmas Collection Live!
message: Explore our amazing collection of Christmas wishes and greeting cards. Perfect for sharing joy with your loved ones this holiday season.

title: ⚠️ Website Maintenance
message: Scheduled maintenance will occur on December 25th from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM EST. Some features may be temporarily unavailable.

title: 🎊 New Year Collection Coming Soon
message: Get ready for 2025! Our New Year wishes collection will be available starting December 26th. Be the first to share celebratory messages!

title: 🚨 Security Update Required
message: Please update your browser for the best security and performance. We recommend using the latest version of Chrome, Firefox, or Safari.

title: 🎁 Special Offer Alert
message: Premium templates are now free for all users until December 31st! Upgrade your festival wishes with beautiful designs.

title: 📱 Mobile App Beta
message: Join our mobile app beta testing program! Experience BYAMN Festhub on your smartphone with exclusive features.

title: 🕉️ Diwali Wishes Popular
message: Your Diwali wishes have been viewed over 1000 times! Thank you for spreading joy and light during the festival season.

title: 🔄 Performance Improvements
message: We've made significant improvements to loading times and overall performance. Enjoy a faster, smoother experience!
